Key Match Events: Jaden Hardy scored a season-high 25 points
P.J. Washington made two free throws to tie the game at 109 with 2:26 left
P.J. Washington drained the go-ahead corner 3-pointer to give Dallas a three-point lead
Quentin Grimes scored a three-point play to seal the victory
The Mavericks ended the game on a 17-2 run in the fourth quarter
Pre-Game Insights: The game's start time was moved up an hour due to snowy weather
The NBA also postponed Thursdayâ€™s game between the Lakers and Charlotte Hornets due to wildfires
Post-Match Reflections: Jason Kidd expressed readiness for the game despite the early start time
The Mavericks won their last two games without Luka Doncic and Kyrie Irving
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jaden Hardy led the Mavericks by scoring a season-high 25 points
Dereck Lively II added a season-high 21 points and a season-high 16 rebounds
The first 5,000 fans in attendance received Daniel Gafford pins
